title: San Serif Help
content:
Any ideas on what the font is. Font ID wont work because of 3D Affect. Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [jackets.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023163146/http:/typophile.com/files/jackets.jpg) | 38.8 KB |
author: Aesa

comments.content:
actually works pretty good with a little image editing. try Levenim Bold, which is a Windows 7 font.

if you don't have windows, there are many sans serif options similar. you can search whatfontis or any other for some to your liking.
that too. my bad for overlooking the obvious. but now they have two options!
